DOC.brief_summary: This non-comparative case series study assess ability females 11-16 year age , inclusive , request emergency contraception ( EC ) use study product , DR-104 ( Plan B® 1.5 ) , appropriately safely without provider counseling .
DOC.detailed_description: To simulate over-the-counter ( OTC ) setting , potential subject expect read label text outside study package determine whether use study product without provider direction assistance . The study product , Plan B® 1.5 , dispense subject appropriately self-selected indicate wanted participate study receive study product . Subjects could also appropriately self-select use study product . Follow-up contact conduct approximately one , four , eight week follow date subject dispense study product . At contact , subject answer question regard product use , health problem since last contact , pregnancy status . Subjects permit enroll Actual Use Study , however assess repeat use emergency contraceptive ( EC ) ( use addition study product ) subject also query one- , four- , eight-week follow-up contact regard use additional EC .
